nodes.description: 8月19日发生自杀式爆炸袭击，造成32人死亡55人受伤，袭击者约20岁
nodes.support_text: Thirty-two people, seven policemen and two health officials among them, were killed and 55 others injured when a suicide bomber blew himself up near the emergency ward of the District Headquarters Hospital here on Tuesday.

nodes.description: 袭击前当地民众聚集抗议什叶派领袖巴西特·阿里遇害事件
nodes.support_text: The attack was carried out when a large number of people had gathered there to protest against the murder of local Shia leader Basit Ali earlier in the day.

nodes.description: 袭击者头部和腿部残骸在爆炸现场被发现，急诊科完全损毁
nodes.support_text: The bomber’s head and legs have been found, police sources said. The emergency ward was completely destroyed by the explosion.

nodes.description: 10-12名伤者处于危重状态，包括警察、医护人员和记者
nodes.support_text: 10 to 12 of the injured were in critical condition. Some of the injured, including several policemen, health workers and two journalists, were taken to the Combined Military Hospital and private hospitals.

nodes.description: 14名遇难者中包含一个家庭全体成员
nodes.support_text: The deceased included 14 members of a family.

nodes.description: 袭击者被证实为太阳组织（TTP）成员
nodes.support_text: The Tehrik-i-Taliban Pakistan has claimed responsibility for the attack.

nodes.description: 太阳组织声明袭击针对政府官员而非特定教派
nodes.support_text: Taliban spokesman Maulvi Omar told Dawn on phone they had targeted police and other government officials and 'did not intend to attack any specific religious sect (the Shia),'

nodes.description: 袭击后全城商铺关闭，市民担忧教派冲突升级
nodes.support_text: all shops, markets and business centres were closed for fear of an eruption of sectarian clashes in the area.

nodes.description: 军警封锁区域并加强巡逻，实施宵禁和禁止摩托车骑行
nodes.support_text: Army and police cordoned off the area and started patrolling.

nodes.description: 当地政府召开紧急会议部署反教派冲突预案
nodes.support_text: the city’s civil and military administrations, which had been convened to prepare a plan to cope with possible sectarian strife in the sensitive district.

nodes.description: 什叶派社区宣布从8月20日起实施3天哀悼期
nodes.support_text: The Shia community decided to observe a three-day mourning from Wednesday in Dera Ismail Khan for the innocent people killed in the blast.

nodes.description: 首批14名遇难者于8月19日晚举行葬礼
nodes.support_text: Four victims of the blasts were laid to rest in a graveyard in Kotli Imam while funeral prayers for 20 others were offered in Chah Syed Munawar Shah late on Tuesday night.

nodes.description: 紧张局势催生针对杀戮行为
nodes.support_text: 紧张局势催生针对杀戮行为

nodes.description: 爆炸动机显现为教派冲突
nodes.support_text: 爆炸动机显现为教派冲突

nodes.description: 爆炸明显针对什叶派抗议者
nodes.support_text: 爆炸明显针对什叶派抗议者

nodes.description: 警察官员声明爆炸动机
nodes.support_text: 警察官员声明爆炸动机

nodes.description: 地方政府调用增援以加强警察力量
nodes.support_text: 地方政府调用增援以加强警察力量

nodes.description: 警方在多个地点设立路障
nodes.support_text: 警方在多个地点设立路障

nodes.description: 实施第144条款以加强管控
nodes.support_text: 实施第144条款以加强管控

nodes.description: 禁止摩托车后座载人
nodes.support_text: 禁止摩托车后座载人
